Ritual.ab: ka panǰag weh bēd yazišn ardā fraward ǰud az gāhānbār ud srōš tā abārīg yā̊. vīsāδa. ō gōwišn ka gāhānbār ud srōš bēd nē gōwišn agar ardā farward padiš ka yaōždātą. guft pas zōt ud rāspīg aṣ̌əm. vohū. se guftan I frauuarāne. ud hāuuanə̄e. ud sāuuaŋhə̄e. ud raθβąm. tā gyāg f.ahurahe. mazdā̊. raeuuatō. xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō. aməšanąm. spəṇtanąm. aṣ̌āunąm. frauuašinąm. tā nabānazdištanąm. frauuašanąm. frauuašanąm. xšnaoϑra. tā sar guftan ka panǰag ī gāhānīg bēd gāθābiiō tā sar guftan zōt yaϑā. ahū. vairiiō. yō. ātrauuaxšō. rāspīg aθā. ratuš. kardan hamrāspīg yaϑā. ahū. vairiiō. yō. zaōtā. zōt aϑā. ratuš. kardan zōt ud rāspīg ahurəm. mazdąm. raēuuaṇtəm. xᵛarənaŋᵛhaṇtəm. yazamaide. aməṣ̌ā. spəṇtā. huxšaϑrā. huδā̊ŋhō. yazamaide. frauuaṣ̌aiiō. yazamaide. yā̊. vīsāδa. āuuaiieiṇti. hamaspaϑmaēdaēm. paiti. ratūm. tā. nəmaŋha. ka panǰag ī gāhānīg bēd gāθā. spəṇtā. tā sar gōwišn barsom abar barsomdān nihišn sar ī zōhr bē nigerišn aṣ̌əm. vohū. se guftan

When it is (a performance during) the Five Good Days, a cermony for Ardā Fraward except for Gāhānbār or Srōš, he has to recite the text until the additional yā̊ vīsāδa. When it is a ceremony for Gāhānbār or for Srōš, then he has not to rtecite this text. If the frauuaṣ̌is are mentioned (in the šnūman), then, when he has said yaōždātą, then the zōt and the rāspīg recite three aṣ̌əm vohū, then the frauuarāne. and the section hāuuanə̄e and the section sāuuaŋhə̄e and the section raθβąm. until (the šnūman) f.ahurahe. mazdā̊. raeuuatō. xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō. aməšanąm. spəṇtanąm. aṣ̌āunąm. frauuašinąm. OD nabānazdištanąm. frauuašinąm. xšnaoϑra until the end. When they are the Five Days of the Gāθās, they should say gāθābiiō until the end. Then the zōt should say yaϑā. ahū. vairiiō. yō. ātrauuaxšō. and the rāspīg should answer aθā. ratuš. The same rāspīg should say: yaϑā. ahū. vairiiō. yō. zaōtā. The zōt should aanswer: aϑā. ratuš. The zōt and the rāspīg should recite togeher: ahurəm. mazdąm. raēuuaṇtəm. xᵛarənaŋᵛhaṇtəm. yazamaide. aməṣ̌ā. spəṇtā. huxšaϑrā. huδā̊ŋhō. yazamaide. frauuaṣ̌aiiō. yazamaide. yā̊. vīsāδa. āuuaiieiṇti. hamaspaϑmaēdaēm. paiti. ratūm. until nəmaŋha. When they are the Five Days of the Gāθās, they shoukd recite the section gāθā. spəṇtā.. He has to put the barsom on the barsomdān, take the bowl for the zōhr and gaze at the zōhr. They should recite three aṣ̌əm. vohū.
